display.title: Building a Lightning Forge
display.description: A Lightning Forge can be found above Xelric's workshop, immense magic enables it to summon lightning on demand. With the right source of magic you could make your own Lightning Forge Structure Kit by dropping a Stone Saw & Hammer, a stack of Copper Ingots & a Cluster of Magic onto a Fletching Table [Required: 1x Stone Saw & Hammer 64x Copper Ingot 1x Cluster of Magic | Drop Craft With: Fletching Table]
